org.jamesframework.core.problems

Interface Problem<SolutionType extends Solution>

  • Type Parameters:
    SolutionType - the solution type that corresponds to this problem, required to extend Solution
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SubsetProblem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProblemWithData, SubsetProblemWithData

    public interface Problem<SolutionType extends Solution>
    Interface of a problem with a generic solution type. Contains methods to evaluate a solution, to compare solutions based on their evaluation, and to create random solutions or to copy a solution.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SolutionType copySolution(SolutionType solution)
      Creates a (deep) copy of the given solution.
      SolutionType createRandomSolution()
      Creates a random solution.
      double evaluate(SolutionType solution)
      Evaluates a given solution.
      boolean isMinimizing()
      Indicates whether scores are being minimized or maximized.
      boolean rejectSolution(SolutionType solution)
      Indicates whether the given solution should be rejected during search, regardless of its evaluation.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        double evaluate(SolutionType solution)
        Evaluates a given solution. The computed score reflects the quality of the solution; depending on whether scores are maximized (or minimized), higher (respectively lower) scores indicate improvement.
        Parameters:
        solution - the solution to evaluate
        Returns:
        evaluation of the solution
        See Also:
        isMinimizing()

      • rejectSolution

        boolean rejectSolution(SolutionType solution)
        Indicates whether the given solution should be rejected during search, regardless of its evaluation. This method may for example be used to discard solutions that do not satisfy imposed constraints.
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to verify
        Returns:
        true if the given solution should be rejected

      • isMinimizing

        boolean isMinimizing()
        Indicates whether scores are being minimized or maximized.
        Returns:
        true if scores are being minimized

      • createRandomSolution

        SolutionType createRandomSolution()
        Creates a random solution. Such random solutions can for example be used as initial solution for neighbourhood searches.
        Returns:
        a random solution

      • copySolution

        SolutionType copySolution(SolutionType solution)
        Creates a (deep) copy of the given solution.
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to copy
        Returns:
        a deep copy of the given solution
